interaction.meta.command.help:
§6§lImyvm World Geo Commands:

§e/imyvm-world-geo select start
  §fStart selecting positions with a §6command block§f.

§e/imyvm-world-geo select stop
  §fStop selection mode.

§e/imyvm-world-geo select reset
  §fClear all selected points but keep selection mode active.

§a/imyvm-world-geo create <§bshapeType§a> [§bname§a]
  §fCreate a region of the given shape (§brectangle§f, §bcircle§f, §bpolygon§f) from selected positions.
  §fOptionally give it a name.

§c/imyvm-world-geo delete <§bregionIdentifier§c>
  §fDelete a region by its ID or name.

§c/imyvm-world-geo rename <§bregionIdentifier§c> <§bnewName§c>
  §fRename an existing region.

§d/imyvm-world-geo addscope <§bshapeType§d> <§bregionIdentifier§d> [§bscopeName§d]
  §fAdd a new scope to the region with the given shape and optional scope name.

§d/imyvm-world-geo deletescope <§bregionIdentifier§d> <§bscopeName§d>
  §fDelete a scope from a region.

§d/imyvm-world-geo modifyscope <§bregionIdentifier§d> <§bscopeName§d> [§bnewName§d]
  §fModify a scope's properties or rename it.

§9/imyvm-world-geo setting add <§bregionIdentifier§9> <§bsettingType§9> <§bkey§9> <§bvalue§9> [§bplayerName§9]
  §fAdd a setting to a region, optionally for a specific player.

§9/imyvm-world-geo setting remove <§bregionIdentifier§9> <§bsettingType§9> <§bkey§9> [§bplayerName§9]
  §fRemove a setting from a region, optionally for a specific player.

§5/imyvm-world-geo settingscope add <§bregionIdentifier§5> <§bscopeName§5> <§bsettingType§5> <§bkey§5> <§bvalue§5> [§bplayerName§5]
  §fAdd a setting to a specific scope of a region, optionally for a specific player.

§5/imyvm-world-geo settingscope remove <§bregionIdentifier§5> <§bscopeName§5> <§bsettingType§5> <§bkey§5> [§bplayerName§5]
  §fRemove a setting from a specific scope, optionally for a specific player.

§6/imyvm-world-geo query <§bregionIdentifier§6>
  §fShow detailed information about a region.

§6/imyvm-world-geo list
  §fList all regions.

§6/imyvm-world-geo toggle
  §fToggle the action bar display for regions.

§6/imyvm-world-geo help
  §fShow this help message.
